df-t0
blocks.content: Define T_0 or Kolmogorov spaces. A T_0 space satisfies a kind of "topological extensionality" principle (compare ~ ax-ext ): any two points which are members of the same open sets are equal, or in contraposition, for any two distinct points there is an open set which contains one point but not the other. This differs from T_1 spaces (see ~ ist1-2 ) in that in a T_1 space you can choose which point will be in the open set and which outside; in a T_0 space you only know that one of the two points is in the set. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Feb-2010.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-t0(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(ct0, crab(s0, ctop, wral(s1, cuni(cv(s0)), wral(s2, cuni(cv(s0)), wi(wral(s3, cv(s0), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: df-t1
blocks.content: The class of all T_1 spaces, also called Fréchet spaces. Morris, Topology without tears, p. 30 ex. 3. (Contributed by FL, 18-Jun-2007.)

blocks.name: df-haus
blocks.content: Define the class of all Hausdorff (or T_2) spaces. A Hausdorff space is a topology in which distinct points have disjoint open neighborhoods. Definition of Hausdorff space in [Munkres] p. 98. (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-2007.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-haus(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cha, crab(s0, ctop, wral(s1, cuni(cv(s0)), wral(s2, cuni(cv(s0)), wi(wne(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wrex(s4, cv(s0), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s4)), wceq(cin(cv(s3), cv(s4)), emptycls)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-haus(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ⊢ Haus = { s0 ∈ Top | ∀(s1 ∈ ⋃ s0, ∀(s2 ∈ ⋃ s0,(s1 ≠ s2 → ∃(s3 ∈ s0, ∃(s4 ∈ s0,(s1 ∈ s3 ∧ s2 ∈ s4 ∧(s3 ⋂ s4)= ∅))))))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: df-reg
blocks.content: Define regular spaces. A space is regular if a point and a closed set can be separated by neighborhoods. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Feb-2010.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-reg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(creg, crab(s0, ctop, wral(s1, cv(s0), wral(s2, cv(s1), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-nrm
blocks.content: Define normal spaces. A space is normal if disjoint closed sets can be separated by neighborhoods. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Feb-2010.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-nrm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cnrm, crab(s0, ctop, wral(s1, cv(s0), wral(s2, cin(cfv(ccld, cv(s0)), cpw(cv(s1))), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wa(wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-cnrm
blocks.content: Define completely normal spaces. A space is completely normal if all its subspaces are normal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: df-pnrm
blocks.content: Define perfectly normal spaces. A space is perfectly normal if it is normal and every closed set is a G_δ set, meaning that it is a countable intersection of open sets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: ist0
blocks.content: The predicate "is a T_0 space". Every pair of distinct points is topologically distinguishable. For the way this definition is usually encountered, see ~ ist0-3 . (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Feb-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm ist0(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ct0), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wral(s2, c0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, ct0), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wral(s2, c0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, ct0), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wral(s2, c0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, ct0), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wral(s2, c0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s2, c1))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ct0, ctop, wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wral(s2, c0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wral(s0, cuni(cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cuni(cv(hs0)), wi(wral(s2, cv(hs0), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  raleqbidv(s0, cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s1, cuni(cv(hs0)), wi(wral(s2, cv(hs0), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wral(s2, c0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  raleqbidv(s1, cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wral(s2, cv(hs0), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wral(s2, c0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s2, cv(hs0), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wral(s2, c0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))
  raleq(s2, cv(hs0), c0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  df-t0(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wral(s2, c0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ist0(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Kol2 ↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1)))))
  ⊣ c1 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ Kol2 ↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1))))), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ Kol2 ↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1))))), d(s1, c1))
  a1ii((c0 ∈ Kol2 ↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1))))), d(s2, c1))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ct0, ctop, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1))), ∀(s0 ∈ ⋃ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ ⋃ hs0,(∀(s2 ∈ hs0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1))))
  raleqbidv(s0, ⋃ hs0, c1, hs0 = c0, ∀(s1 ∈ ⋃ hs0,(∀(s2 ∈ hs0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1)), ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1)))
  raleqbidv(s1, ⋃ hs0, c1, hs0 = c0, (∀(s2 ∈ hs0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1), (∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1))
  syl6eqr(⋃ hs0, c1, ⋃ c0, hs0 = c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  imbi1d(hs0 = c0, ∀(s2 ∈ hs0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2)), s0 = s1, ∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2)))
  raleq(s2, hs0, c0, (s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))
  df-t0(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: ist1
blocks.content: The predicate "is a T_1 space". (Contributed by FL, 18-Jun-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm ist1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ct1), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, c0)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ct1, ctop, wral(s0, c1, wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, c0))), wral(s0, cuni(cv(hs0)), wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, cv(hs0)))))
  ralbidv2(s0, cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, cv(hs0))), wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, c0)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(cv(hs0))), wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, c0)))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  eleq2d(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, cv(hs0)), cfv(ccld, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ccld)
  df-t1(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c1, wcel(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, c0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ist1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Fre ↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, { s0 } ∈(Clsd ` c0))))
  ⊣ c1 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ct1, ctop, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, { s0 } ∈(Clsd ` c0)), ∀(s0 ∈ ⋃ hs0, { s0 } ∈(Clsd ` hs0)))
  ralbidv2(s0, ⋃ hs0, c1, hs0 = c0, { s0 } ∈(Clsd ` hs0), { s0 } ∈(Clsd ` c0))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, s0 ∈ ⋃ hs0, { s0 } ∈(Clsd ` hs0), s0 ∈ c1, { s0 } ∈(Clsd ` c0))
  eleq2d(s0, ⋃ hs0, c1, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr(⋃ hs0, c1, ⋃ c0, hs0 = c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  eleq2d({ s0 }, (Clsd ` hs0), (Clsd ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, ccld)
  df-t1(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c1, { s0 } ∈(Clsd ` c0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ishaus
blocks.content: The predicate "is a Hausdorff space". (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm ishaus(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cha), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), emptycls)))))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cha), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), emptycls))))))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, cha), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), emptycls))))))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cha, ctop, wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), emptycls))))))), wral(s0, cuni(cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cuni(cv(hs0)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cv(hs0), wrex(s3, cv(hs0), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), emptycls))))))))
  raleqbidv(s0, cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s1, cuni(cv(hs0)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cv(hs0), wrex(s3, cv(hs0), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), emptycls)))))), wral(s1, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), emptycls)))))))
  raleqbidv(s1, cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cv(hs0), wrex(s3, cv(hs0), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), emptycls))))), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), emptycls))))))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, cv(hs0), wrex(s3, cv(hs0), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), emptycls)))), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), emptycls)))))
  rexeqbi1dv(s2, cv(hs0), c0, wrex(s3, cv(hs0), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), emptycls))), wrex(s3, c0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), emptycls))))
  rexeq(s3, cv(hs0), c0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), emptycls)))
  df-haus(hs0, s0, s1, s2, s3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wrex(s3, c0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)), emptycls))))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: iscnrm
blocks.content: The property of being completely or hereditarily normal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscnrm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cnrm))))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cnrm)))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccnrm, ctop, wral(s0, cpw(c1), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cnrm)), wral(s0, cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), crest, cv(s0)), cnrm)))
  raleqbidv(s0, cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), cpw(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(co(cv(hs0), crest, cv(s0)), cnrm), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cnrm))
  pweqd(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), crest, cv(s0)), cnrm, co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, crest, cv(s0))
  df-cnrm(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, cpw(c1), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cnrm)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iscnrm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CNrm ↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ P(c1),(c0[|`t]s0)∈ Nrm)))
  ⊣ c1 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ CNrm ↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ P(c1),(c0[|`t]s0)∈ Nrm))), d(s0, c1))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, ccnrm, ctop, ∀(s0 ∈ P(c1),(c0[|`t]s0)∈ Nrm), ∀(s0 ∈ P(⋃ hs0),(hs0[|`t]s0)∈ Nrm))
  raleqbidv(s0, P(⋃ hs0), P(c1), hs0 = c0, (hs0[|`t]s0)∈ Nrm, (c0[|`t]s0)∈ Nrm)
  pweqd(⋃ hs0, c1, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr(⋃ hs0, c1, ⋃ c0, hs0 = c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  eleq1d((hs0[|`t]s0), cnrm, (c0[|`t]s0), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1(hs0, c0, crest, s0)
  df-cnrm(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ P(c1),(c0[|`t]s0)∈ Nrm))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: t0sep
blocks.content: Any two topologically indistinguishable points in a T_0 space are identical. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm t0sep(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ct0), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))), wi(wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, ct0), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wi(wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, c3)), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wi(wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, ct0), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wi(wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  ist0(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c2)
  ancoms(wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wi(wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wi(wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, c3)))
  rspc2va(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3, c2, wi(wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wi(wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, c3)), wi(wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, cv(hs1))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, cv(hs1)))
  ralbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0))), wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0))))
  bibi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wcel(c1, cv(s0)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, cv(hs1)), wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, c3))
  ralbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0))), wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0))))
  bibi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0)))
  eleq1(cv(hs1), c3, cv(s0))
  eqeq2(cv(hs1), c3, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, c3)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm t0sep(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Kol2 ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2))→(∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ↔ c3 ∈ s0))→ c1 = c3))
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  sylan(c0 ∈ Kol2, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), (∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ↔ c3 ∈ s0))→ c1 = c3), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ↔ hs1 ∈ s0))→ hs0 = hs1))))
  simprbi(c0 ∈ Kol2, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ↔ hs1 ∈ s0))→ hs0 = hs1))), c0 ∈ Top)
  ist0(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c2)
  ancoms(∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ↔ hs1 ∈ s0))→ hs0 = hs1))), (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), (∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ↔ c3 ∈ s0))→ c1 = c3))
  rspc2va(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3, c2, (∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ↔ hs1 ∈ s0))→ hs0 = hs1), (∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ↔ c3 ∈ s0))→ c1 = c3), (∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ↔ hs1 ∈ s0))→ c1 = hs1))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ↔ hs1 ∈ s0)), hs0 = hs1, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ↔ hs1 ∈ s0)), c1 = hs1)
  ralbidv(s0, c0, hs0 = c1, (hs0 ∈ s0 ↔ hs1 ∈ s0), (c1 ∈ s0 ↔ hs1 ∈ s0))
  bibi1d(hs0 = c1, hs0 ∈ s0, hs1 ∈ s0, c1 ∈ s0)
  eleq1(hs0, c1, s0)
  eqeq1(hs0, c1, hs1)
  imbi12d(hs1 = c3, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ↔ hs1 ∈ s0)), c1 = hs1, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ↔ c3 ∈ s0)), c1 = c3)
  ralbidv(s0, c0, hs1 = c3, (c1 ∈ s0 ↔ hs1 ∈ s0), (c1 ∈ s0 ↔ c3 ∈ s0))
  bibi2d(hs1 = c3, c1 ∈ s0, hs1 ∈ s0, c3 ∈ s0)
  eleq1(hs1, c3, s0)
  eqeq2(hs1, c3, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w((∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ↔ hs1 ∈ s0))→ c1 = hs1))
  diff.hs1.w((∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ↔ c3 ∈ s0))→ c1 = c3))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: t0dist
blocks.content: Any two distinct points in a T_0 space are topologically distinguishable. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Feb-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm t0dist(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ct0), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c1, c3))), wrex(s0, c0, wn(wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, ct0), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c1, c3))), wrex(s0, c0, wn(wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0))))), wn(wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0))))))
  3imp2(wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c1, c3), wn(wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0))))))
  exp32(wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wi(wne(c1, c3), wn(wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0)))))))
  necon3ad(c1, c3, wa(wcel(c0, ct0), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))), wral(s0, c0, wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0)))))
  t0sep(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  rexnal(s0, c0, wb(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0))))
}

blocks.name: t1sncld
blocks.content: In a T_1 space, singletons are closed. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Feb-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm t1sncld(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(csn(c1), cfv(ccld, c0)))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(csn(c1), cfv(ccld, c0)))
  simplbiim(wcel(c0, ct1), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(csn(c1), cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(c0, ctop), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccld, c0))))
  ist1(hs0, c0, c2)
  rspccv(hs0, c2, c1, wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccld, c0)), wcel(csn(c1), cfv(ccld, c0)))
  eleq1d(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccld, c0), csn(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(csn(c1), cfv(ccld, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm t1sncld(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Fre ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ { c1 } ∈(Clsd ` c0))
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
} = {
  imp(c0 ∈ Fre, c1 ∈ c2, { c1 } ∈(Clsd ` c0))
  simplbiim(c0 ∈ Fre, (c1 ∈ c2 → { c1 } ∈(Clsd ` c0)), c0 ∈ Top, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, { hs0 } ∈(Clsd ` c0)))
  ist1(hs0, c0, c2)
  rspccv(hs0, c2, c1, { hs0 } ∈(Clsd ` c0), { c1 } ∈(Clsd ` c0))
  eleq1d({ hs0 }, (Clsd ` c0), { c1 }, hs0 = c1)
  sneq(hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w({ c1 } ∈(Clsd ` c0))
}

blocks.name: t1ficld
blocks.content: In a T_1 space, finite sets are closed. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm t1ficld(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ct1), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cfn)), wcel(c1, cfv(ccld, c0)))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
} = {
  syl5eqelr(c1, cfv(ccld, c0), ciun(hs0, c1, csn(cv(hs0))), w3a(wcel(c0, ct1), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cfn)))
  iunid(hs0, c1)
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, ct1), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cfn)), wcel(ciun(hs0, c1, csn(cv(hs0))), cfv(ccld, c0)), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cfn), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccld, c0))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, ct1), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(c0, ctop))
  simplbi(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, ctop), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccld, c0))))
  simp3(wcel(c0, ct1), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cfn))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, ct1), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c1, cfn), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccld, c0))))
  mpan9(wcel(c0, ct1), wss(c1, c2), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccld, c0))), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccld, c0))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, ct1), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccld, c0))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  ist1(hs0, c0, c2)
  ssralv(hs0, c1, c2, wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccld, c0)))
  iuncld(hs0, c0, c1, csn(cv(hs0)), c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm t1ficld(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Fre ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin)→ c1 ∈(Clsd ` c0))
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
} = {
  syl5eqelr(c1, (Clsd ` c0), ⋃(hs0 ∈ c1, { hs0 }), (c0 ∈ Fre ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin))
  iunid(hs0, c1)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ Fre ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c1 ∈ Fin), ⋃(hs0 ∈ c1, { hs0 })∈(Clsd ` c0), c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Fin, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, { hs0 } ∈(Clsd ` c0)))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ Fre, c1 ⊆ c2, c1 ∈ Fin, c0 ∈ Top)
  simplbi(c0 ∈ Fre, c0 ∈ Top, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, { hs0 } ∈(Clsd ` c0)))
  simp3(c0 ∈ Fre, c1 ⊆ c2, c1 ∈ Fin)
  3adant3(c0 ∈ Fre, c1 ⊆ c2, c1 ∈ Fin, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, { hs0 } ∈(Clsd ` c0)))
  mpan9(c0 ∈ Fre, c1 ⊆ c2, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, { hs0 } ∈(Clsd ` c0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, { hs0 } ∈(Clsd ` c0)))
  simprbi(c0 ∈ Fre, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, { hs0 } ∈(Clsd ` c0)), c0 ∈ Top)
  ist1(hs0, c0, c2)
  ssralv(hs0, c1, c2, { hs0 } ∈(Clsd ` c0))
  iuncld(hs0, c0, c1, { hs0 }, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: hausnei
blocks.content: Neighborhood property of a Hausdorff space. (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm hausnei(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cha), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c1, c3))), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, w3a(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  3imp2(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c1, c3), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, w3a(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))))
  com3r(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wi(wne(c1, c3), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, w3a(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))))))
  ex(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wi(wcel(c0, cha), wi(wne(c1, c3), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, w3a(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))))))
  syl5(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(c0, cha), wi(wne(c1, c3), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, w3a(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))))), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wi(wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))))))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cha), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wi(wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))))))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  ishaus(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, c0, c2)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3, c2, wi(wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))))), wi(wne(c1, c3), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, w3a(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))))), wi(wne(c1, cv(hs1)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, w3a(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))), wne(c1, cv(hs1)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, w3a(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))))
  neeq1(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1))
  2rexbidv(s0, s1, c0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)), w3a(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))
  3anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls), wcel(c1, cv(s0)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wne(c1, cv(hs1)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, w3a(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))), wne(c1, c3), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, w3a(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))))
  neeq2(cv(hs1), c3, c1)
  2rexbidv(s0, s1, c0, c0, wceq(cv(hs1), c3), w3a(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)), w3a(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls)))
  3anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls), wcel(c3, cv(s1)))
  eleq1(cv(hs1), c3, cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wne(c1, cv(hs1)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, w3a(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))))))
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wne(c1, c3), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, w3a(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s1)), wceq(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), emptycls))))))

thm hausnei(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Haus ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ c3))→ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ∧ c3 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅))))
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  3imp2(c0 ∈ Haus, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c1 ≠ c3, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ∧ c3 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅))))
  com3r(c0 ∈ Haus, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c1 ≠ c3 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ∧ c3 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅)))))
  ex(c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, (c0 ∈ Haus →(c1 ≠ c3 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ∧ c3 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅))))))
  syl5((c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2), c0 ∈ Haus, (c1 ≠ c3 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ∧ c3 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅)))), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs0 ≠ hs1 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ hs1 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅)))))))
  simprbi(c0 ∈ Haus, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(hs0 ≠ hs1 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ hs1 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅)))))), c0 ∈ Top)
  ishaus(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, c0, c2)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3, c2, (hs0 ≠ hs1 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ hs1 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅)))), (c1 ≠ c3 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ∧ c3 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅)))), (c1 ≠ hs1 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ∧ hs1 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅)))))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c1, hs0 ≠ hs1, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ hs1 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅))), c1 ≠ hs1, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ∧ hs1 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅))))
  neeq1(hs0, c1, hs1)
  2rexbidv(s0, s1, c0, c0, hs0 = c1, (hs0 ∈ s0 ∧ hs1 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅), (c1 ∈ s0 ∧ hs1 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅))
  3anbi1d(hs0 = c1, hs0 ∈ s0, hs1 ∈ s1, (s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅, c1 ∈ s0)
  eleq1(hs0, c1, s0)
  imbi12d(hs1 = c3, c1 ≠ hs1, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ∧ hs1 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅))), c1 ≠ c3, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ∧ c3 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅))))
  neeq2(hs1, c3, c1)
  2rexbidv(s0, s1, c0, c0, hs1 = c3, (c1 ∈ s0 ∧ hs1 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅), (c1 ∈ s0 ∧ c3 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅))
  3anbi2d(hs1 = c3, c1 ∈ s0, hs1 ∈ s1, (s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅, c3 ∈ s1)
  eleq1(hs1, c3, s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ≠ hs1 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ∧ hs1 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅)))))
  diff.hs1.w((c1 ≠ c3 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 ∧ c3 ∈ s1 ∧(s0 ⋂ s1)= ∅)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs1, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
}

thm t0top(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(c0, ctop))
} = {
  simplbi(wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(c0, ctop), wral(hs0, cuni(c0), wral(hs2, cuni(c0), wi(wral(hs1, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))))
  ist0(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Kol2 → c0 ∈ Top)
} = {
  simplbi(c0 ∈ Kol2, c0 ∈ Top, ∀(hs0 ∈ ⋃ c0, ∀(hs2 ∈ ⋃ c0,(∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ hs1 ↔ hs2 ∈ hs1))→ hs0 = hs2))))
  ist0(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, ⋃ c0)
  eqid(⋃ c0)

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

} = {

  simplbi(c0 ∈ Haus, c0 ∈ Top, ∀(hs0 ∈ ⋃ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ ⋃ c0,(hs0 ≠ hs1 → ∃(hs2 ∈ c0, ∃(hs3 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧ hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧(hs2 ⋂ hs3)= ∅)))))))

blocks.name: isreg
blocks.content: The predicate "is a regular space". In a regular space, any open neighborhood has a closed subneighborhood. Note that some authors require the space to be Hausdorff (which would make it the same as T_3), but we reserve the phrase "regular Hausdorff" for that as many topologists do. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Feb-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isreg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, creg), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s2)), cv(s0))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, creg, ctop, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s2)), cv(s0)))))), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, cv(hs0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cv(s0)))))))
  raleqbi1dv(s0, cv(hs0), c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, cv(hs0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cv(s0))))), wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s2)), cv(s0))))))
  ralbidv(s1, cv(s0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s2, cv(hs0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cv(s0)))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s2)), cv(s0)))))
  rexeqbi1dv(s2, cv(hs0), c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s2)), cv(s0))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s2)), cv(s0)))
  sseq1d(cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1d(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cv(s2), cfv(ccl, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ccl)
  df-reg(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s2)), cv(s0)))))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isreg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Reg ↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧((cls ` c0)` s2)⊆ s0))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, creg, ctop, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧((cls ` c0)` s2)⊆ s0)))), ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈ hs0,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧((cls ` hs0)` s2)⊆ s0)))))
  raleqbi1dv(s0, hs0, c0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈ hs0,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧((cls ` hs0)` s2)⊆ s0))), ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧((cls ` c0)` s2)⊆ s0))))
  ralbidv(s1, s0, hs0 = c0, ∃(s2 ∈ hs0,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧((cls ` hs0)` s2)⊆ s0)), ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧((cls ` c0)` s2)⊆ s0)))
  rexeqbi1dv(s2, hs0, c0, (s1 ∈ s2 ∧((cls ` hs0)` s2)⊆ s0), (s1 ∈ s2 ∧((cls ` c0)` s2)⊆ s0))
  anbi2d(hs0 = c0, s1 ∈ s2, ((cls ` hs0)` s2)⊆ s0, ((cls ` c0)` s2)⊆ s0)
  sseq1d(((cls ` hs0)` s2), s0, ((cls ` c0)` s2), hs0 = c0)
  fveq1d((cls ` hs0), s2, (cls ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, ccl)
  df-reg(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧((cls ` c0)` s2)⊆ s0)))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: regsep
blocks.content: In a regular space, every neighborhood of a point contains a closed subneighborhood. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm regsep(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, creg), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c1)), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3imp(wcel(c0, creg), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c1), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), c1))))
  syl6(wcel(c0, creg), wcel(c1, c0), wi(wcel(c2, c1), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), c1)))), wral(hs0, c1, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), c1)))))
  simplbiim(wcel(c0, creg), wi(wcel(c1, c0), wral(hs0, c1, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), c1))))), wcel(c0, ctop), wral(hs1, c0, wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), cv(hs1)))))))
  isreg(hs1, hs0, s0, c0)
  rspccv(hs1, c0, c1, wral(hs0, cv(hs1), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), cv(hs1))))), wral(hs0, c1, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), c1)))))
  raleqbi1dv(hs0, cv(hs1), c1, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), cv(hs1)))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), c1))))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), c1)))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), cv(hs1)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), c1))
  sseq2(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)))
  rspccv(hs0, c1, c2, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), c1))), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), c1))))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), c1)))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(c2, cv(s0)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w(wral(hs0, c1, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), c1)))))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s0)), c1))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm regsep(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Reg ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c1)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c2 ∈ s0 ∧((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ c1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  3imp(c0 ∈ Reg, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ c1, ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c2 ∈ s0 ∧((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ c1)))
  syl6(c0 ∈ Reg, c1 ∈ c0, (c2 ∈ c1 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c2 ∈ s0 ∧((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ c1))), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ c1))))
  simplbiim(c0 ∈ Reg, (c1 ∈ c0 → ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ c1)))), c0 ∈ Top, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ hs1, ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ hs1)))))
  isreg(hs1, hs0, s0, c0)
  rspccv(hs1, c0, c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ hs1, ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ hs1))), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ c1))))
  raleqbi1dv(hs0, hs1, c1, ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ hs1)), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ c1)))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, hs1 = c1, (hs0 ∈ s0 ∧((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ hs1), (hs0 ∈ s0 ∧((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ c1))
  anbi2d(hs1 = c1, hs0 ∈ s0, ((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ hs1, ((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ c1)
  sseq2(hs1, c1, ((cls ` c0)` s0))
  rspccv(hs0, c1, c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ c1)), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c2 ∈ s0 ∧((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ c1)))
  rexbidv(s0, c0, hs0 = c2, (hs0 ∈ s0 ∧((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ c1), (c2 ∈ s0 ∧((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ c1))
  anbi1d(hs0 = c2, hs0 ∈ s0, ((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ c1, c2 ∈ s0)
  eleq1(hs0, c2, s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w(∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 ∧((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ c1))))
  diff.hs0.c(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ c0,(c2 ∈ s0 ∧((cls ` c0)` s0)⊆ c1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: isnrm
blocks.content: The predicate "is a normal space." Much like the case for regular spaces, normal does not imply Hausdorff or even regular. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Feb-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isnrm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cnrm), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cin(cfv(ccld, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s2)), cv(s0))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cnrm, ctop, wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cin(cfv(ccld, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s2)), cv(s0)))))), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wral(s1, cin(cfv(ccld, cv(hs0)), cpw(cv(s0))), wrex(s2, cv(hs0), wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cv(s0)))))))
  raleqbi1dv(s0, cv(hs0), c0, wral(s1, cin(cfv(ccld, cv(hs0)), cpw(cv(s0))), wrex(s2, cv(hs0), wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cv(s0))))), wral(s1, cin(cfv(ccld, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s2)), cv(s0))))))
  raleqbidv(s1, cin(cfv(ccld, cv(hs0)), cpw(cv(s0))), cin(cfv(ccld, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s2, cv(hs0), wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cv(s0)))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s2)), cv(s0)))))
  ineq1d(cfv(ccld, cv(hs0)), cpw(cv(s0)), cfv(ccld, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ccld)
  rexeqbi1dv(s2, cv(hs0), c0, wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cv(s0))), wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s2)), cv(s0))))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cv(s0)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s2)), cv(s0)))
  sseq1d(cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cv(s2)), cv(s0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1d(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cv(s2), cfv(ccl, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ccl)
  df-nrm(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cin(cfv(ccld, c0), cpw(cv(s0))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wss(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cv(s2)), cv(s0)))))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isnrm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Nrm ↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈((Clsd ` c0)⋂ P(s0)), ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s1 ⊆ s2 ∧((cls ` c0)` s2)⊆ s0))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cnrm, ctop, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈((Clsd ` c0)⋂ P(s0)), ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s1 ⊆ s2 ∧((cls ` c0)` s2)⊆ s0)))), ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, ∀(s1 ∈((Clsd ` hs0)⋂ P(s0)), ∃(s2 ∈ hs0,(s1 ⊆ s2 ∧((cls ` hs0)` s2)⊆ s0)))))
  raleqbi1dv(s0, hs0, c0, ∀(s1 ∈((Clsd ` hs0)⋂ P(s0)), ∃(s2 ∈ hs0,(s1 ⊆ s2 ∧((cls ` hs0)` s2)⊆ s0))), ∀(s1 ∈((Clsd ` c0)⋂ P(s0)), ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s1 ⊆ s2 ∧((cls ` c0)` s2)⊆ s0))))
  raleqbidv(s1, ((Clsd ` hs0)⋂ P(s0)), ((Clsd ` c0)⋂ P(s0)), hs0 = c0, ∃(s2 ∈ hs0,(s1 ⊆ s2 ∧((cls ` hs0)` s2)⊆ s0)), ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s1 ⊆ s2 ∧((cls ` c0)` s2)⊆ s0)))
  ineq1d((Clsd ` hs0), P(s0), (Clsd ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, ccld)
  rexeqbi1dv(s2, hs0, c0, (s1 ⊆ s2 ∧((cls ` hs0)` s2)⊆ s0), (s1 ⊆ s2 ∧((cls ` c0)` s2)⊆ s0))
  anbi2d(hs0 = c0, s1 ⊆ s2, ((cls ` hs0)` s2)⊆ s0, ((cls ` c0)` s2)⊆ s0)
  sseq1d(((cls ` hs0)` s2), s0, ((cls ` c0)` s2), hs0 = c0)
  fveq1d((cls ` hs0), s2, (cls ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, ccl)
  df-nrm(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈((Clsd ` c0)⋂ P(s0)), ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s1 ⊆ s2 ∧((cls ` c0)` s2)⊆ s0)))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: nrmtop
blocks.content: A normal space is a topological space. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Feb-2010.)

blocks.name: cnrmtop
blocks.content: A completely normal space is a topological space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: iscnrm2
blocks.content: The property of being completely or hereditarily normal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscnrm2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cnrm))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitr4d(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, ccnrm), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cnrm)), wral(s0, cpw(cuni(c0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cnrm)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wral(s0, cpw(cuni(c0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cnrm))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  topontop(c0, c1)
  baib(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c0, ccnrm), wral(s0, cpw(cuni(c0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cnrm)))
  iscnrm(s0, c0, cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  raleqdv(s0, cpw(c1), cpw(cuni(c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cnrm))
  pweqd(c1, cuni(c0), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cuni(c0))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iscnrm2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→(c0 ∈ CNrm ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ P(c1),(c0[|`t]s0)∈ Nrm)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitr4d(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c0 ∈ CNrm, ∀(s0 ∈ P(c1),(c0[|`t]s0)∈ Nrm), ∀(s0 ∈ P(⋃ c0),(c0[|`t]s0)∈ Nrm))
  syl(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), (c0 ∈ CNrm ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ P(⋃ c0),(c0[|`t]s0)∈ Nrm)), c0 ∈ Top)
  topontop(c0, c1)
  baib(c0 ∈ Top, c0 ∈ CNrm, ∀(s0 ∈ P(⋃ c0),(c0[|`t]s0)∈ Nrm))
  iscnrm(s0, c0, ⋃ c0)
  eqid(⋃ c0)
  raleqdv(s0, P(c1), P(⋃ c0), c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), (c0[|`t]s0)∈ Nrm)
  pweqd(c1, ⋃ c0, c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1))
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, ⋃ c0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
}

blocks.name: ispnrm
blocks.content: The property of being perfectly normal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ispnrm(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cpnrm), wa(wcel(c0, cnrm), wss(cfv(ccld, c0), crn(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cmap, cn), cint(crn(cv(s0))))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cpnrm, cnrm, wss(cfv(ccld, c0), crn(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cmap, cn), cint(crn(cv(s0)))))), wss(cfv(ccld, cv(hs0)), crn(cmpt(s0, co(cv(hs0), cmap, cn), cint(crn(cv(s0)))))))
  sseq12d(cfv(ccld, cv(hs0)), crn(cmpt(s0, co(cv(hs0), cmap, cn), cint(crn(cv(s0))))), cfv(ccld, c0), crn(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cmap, cn), cint(crn(cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ccld)
  rneqd(cmpt(s0, co(cv(hs0), cmap, cn), cint(crn(cv(s0)))), cmpt(s0, co(c0, cmap, cn), cint(crn(cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  mpteq1d(s0, co(cv(hs0), cmap, cn), cint(crn(cv(s0))), co(c0, cmap, cn), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cmap, cn)
  df-pnrm(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cnrm)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(cfv(ccld, c0), crn(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cmap, cn), cint(crn(cv(s0)))))))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), cmap, cn)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmap, cn)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ispnrm(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ PNrm ↔(c0 ∈ Nrm ∧(Clsd ` c0)⊆ ran((s0 ∈(c0[↦]ℕ)↦ ⋂ ran(s0)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  elrab2(hs0, c0, cpnrm, cnrm, (Clsd ` c0)⊆ ran((s0 ∈(c0[↦]ℕ)↦ ⋂ ran(s0))), (Clsd ` hs0)⊆ ran((s0 ∈(hs0[↦]ℕ)↦ ⋂ ran(s0))))
  sseq12d((Clsd ` hs0), ran((s0 ∈(hs0[↦]ℕ)↦ ⋂ ran(s0))), (Clsd ` c0), ran((s0 ∈(c0[↦]ℕ)↦ ⋂ ran(s0))), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, ccld)
  rneqd((s0 ∈(hs0[↦]ℕ)↦ ⋂ ran(s0)), (s0 ∈(c0[↦]ℕ)↦ ⋂ ran(s0)), hs0 = c0)
  mpteq1d(s0, (hs0[↦]ℕ), ⋂ ran(s0), (c0[↦]ℕ), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1(hs0, c0, cmap, cn)
  df-pnrm(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cnrm)
  diff.hs0.w((Clsd ` c0)⊆ ran((s0 ∈(c0[↦]ℕ)↦ ⋂ ran(s0))))
  diff.co.s(s0, hs0, cmap, cn)

blocks.name: pnrmnrm
blocks.content: A perfectly normal space is normal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: pnrmtop
blocks.content: A perfectly normal space is a topological space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: pnrmcld
blocks.content: A closed set in a perfectly normal space is a countable intersection of open sets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: pnrmopn
blocks.content: An open set in a perfectly normal space is a countable union of closed sets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)

thm ist0-2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, ct0), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wral(s2, c0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))

  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, ct0), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wral(s2, c0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s2, c1))

  topontop(c0, c1)
  baib(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c0, ct0), wral(s0, cuni(c0), wral(s1, cuni(c0), wi(wral(s2, c0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))

  raleqdv(s1, c1, cuni(c0), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wi(wral(s2, c0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))

thm ist0-2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→(c0 ∈ Kol2 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→(c0 ∈ Kol2 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1))))), d(s2, c1))
  bitr4d(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c0 ∈ Kol2, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1))), ∀(s0 ∈ ⋃ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ ⋃ c0,(∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1))))
  syl(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), (c0 ∈ Kol2 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ ⋃ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ ⋃ c0,(∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1)))), c0 ∈ Top)
  topontop(c0, c1)
  baib(c0 ∈ Top, c0 ∈ Kol2, ∀(s0 ∈ ⋃ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ ⋃ c0,(∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1))))
  ist0(s0, s1, s2, c0, ⋃ c0)
  eqid(⋃ c0)
  raleqbidv(s0, c1, ⋃ c0, c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1)), ∀(s1 ∈ ⋃ c0,(∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1)))
  raleqdv(s1, c1, ⋃ c0, c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), (∀(s2 ∈ c0,(s0 ∈ s2 ↔ s1 ∈ s2))→ s0 = s1))

  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ist1-2
blocks.content: An alternate characterization of T_1 spaces. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 31-Jan-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 24-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ist1-2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, ct1), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, ct1), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s2, c1))

  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, ct1), wral(s1, cuni(c0), wcel(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(ccld, c0)))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  baib(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c0, ct1), wral(s1, cuni(c0), wcel(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(ccld, c0))))
  ist1(s1, c0, cuni(c0))
  raleqdv(s1, c1, cuni(c0), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(ccld, c0)))
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wral(s1, c1, wcel(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(ccld, c0))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wi(wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wral(s1, c1, wral(s0, c1, wi(wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  ralbidva(s1, c1, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(ccld, c0)), wral(s0, c1, wi(wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  3bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(ccld, c0)), wral(s0, c1, wi(wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1))), c0), wral(s0, cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1))))))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1))), c0), wral(s0, cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1)))))))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  eltop2(s0, s2, c0, cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(wcel(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(ccld, c0)), wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1))), c0)), wcel(c0, ctop), wss(csn(cv(s1)), cuni(c0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(c0, ctop))

  eleq2d(cv(s1), c1, cuni(c0), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  iscld2(c0, csn(cv(s1)), cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  ralbidv2(s0, c1, cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1)))))))
  3bitr4g(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1))))))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1)))))))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1)))))))))
  imbi1d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1))))))), wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0)))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), c1, cuni(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(c1, cuni(c0)))
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  imbi2i(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1))))))))
  3bitr4ri(wi(wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1))))))), wi(wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1))))))), wi(wn(wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1))))))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  con1b(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1)))))))
  imbi1i(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1)))))), wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  df-ne(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  imbi1i(wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1))))))))
  con2bii(wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1)))))))
  bitr3i(wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1)))))), wn(wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  rexbiia(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1))))))
  anbi2d(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1)))))
  syl5bbr(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), wceq(cin(cv(s2), csn(cv(s1))), emptycls))
  disjsn(cv(s2), cv(s1))
  syl(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wb(wceq(cin(cv(s2), csn(cv(s1))), emptycls), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1))))), wss(cv(s2), cuni(c0)))
  elssuni(cv(s2), c0)
  reldisj(cv(s2), cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1)))
  rexanali(s2, c0, wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  bitri(wi(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1))))))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wi(wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1)))))))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1))))))))
  imbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1)))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  eldifsn(cv(s0), cuni(c0), cv(s1))
  impexp(wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cdif(cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1)))))))
  ralcom(s1, s0, c1, c1, wi(wral(s2, c0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  diff.cuni.s(s1, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cfv(ctopon, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ctopon, c1)
  diff.ctopon.s(s1)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1)))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(s1))
  diff.cdif.s(s2, cuni(c0), csn(cv(s1)))
  diff.cuni.s(s2, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s2, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(ctopon, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), c1)

blocks.name: t1t0
blocks.content: A T_1 space is a T_0 space. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Feb-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm t1t0(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, ct0))
} = {
  mpcom(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, ct0), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))))
  sylib(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  t1top(c0)
  toptopon2(c0)
  3imtr4d(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, ct0), wral(hs0, cuni(c0), wral(hs2, cuni(c0), wi(wral(hs1, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))), wral(hs0, cuni(c0), wral(hs2, cuni(c0), wi(wral(hs1, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wi(wral(hs0, cuni(c0), wral(hs2, cuni(c0), wi(wral(hs1, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))), wral(hs0, cuni(c0), wral(hs2, cuni(c0), wi(wral(hs1, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))))))
  ralimi(hs0, cuni(c0), wral(hs2, cuni(c0), wi(wral(hs1, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))), wral(hs2, cuni(c0), wi(wral(hs1, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))))
  ralimi(hs2, cuni(c0), wi(wral(hs1, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), wi(wral(hs1, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  imim1i(wral(hs1, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wral(hs1, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))))
  ralimi(hs1, c0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))))
  biimp(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))
  ist1-2(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, cuni(c0))
  ist0-2(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, cuni(c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(c0))
}

  jca((((c0 ∈ Haus ∧(hs0 ∈ ⋃ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ ⋃ c0 ∧ hs0 ≠ hs2))∧ hs1 ∈ c0)∧(hs3 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs2 ∈ hs3 ∧(hs1 ⋂ hs3)= ∅))), hs0 ∈ hs1, ¬ hs2 ∈ hs1)
  simprr1(((c0 ∈ Haus ∧(hs0 ∈ ⋃ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ ⋃ c0 ∧ hs0 ≠ hs2))∧ hs1 ∈ c0), hs3 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ hs1, hs2 ∈ hs3, (hs1 ⋂ hs3)= ∅)
  mtod((((c0 ∈ Haus ∧(hs0 ∈ ⋃ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ ⋃ c0 ∧ hs0 ≠ hs2))∧ hs1 ∈ c0)∧(hs3 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs2 ∈ hs3 ∧(hs1 ⋂ hs3)= ∅))), hs2 ∈ hs1, hs2 ∈(hs1 ⋂ hs3))
  mtbiri((((c0 ∈ Haus ∧(hs0 ∈ ⋃ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ ⋃ c0 ∧ hs0 ≠ hs2))∧ hs1 ∈ c0)∧(hs3 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs2 ∈ hs3 ∧(hs1 ⋂ hs3)= ∅))), hs2 ∈(hs1 ⋂ hs3), hs2 ∈ ∅)

blocks.name: hausnei2
blocks.content: The Hausdorff condition still holds if one considers general neighborhoods instead of open sets. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 5-Sep-2009.)

blocks.name: cnhaus
blocks.content: The preimage of a Hausdorff topology under an injective map is Hausdorff. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: isnrm2
blocks.content: An alternate characterization of normality. This is the important property in the proof of Urysohn's lemma. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Feb-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 24-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: isnrm3
blocks.content: A topological space is normal iff any two disjoint closed sets are separated by open sets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: cnrmi
blocks.content: A subspace of a completely normal space is normal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnrmi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), cnrm))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c0, crest, c1), cnrm, co(c0, crest, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), wa(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c1, c2)))
  restin(c0, ccnrm, c1, c2, cuni(c0))
  rspcdva(hs0, cin(c1, cuni(c0)), cpw(cuni(c0)), wa(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), cnrm), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(hs0)), cnrm))
  eleq1d(co(c0, crest, cv(hs0)), cnrm, co(c0, crest, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), cin(c1, cuni(c0))))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cin(c1, cuni(c0)), c0, crest)
  adantr(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c1, c2), wral(hs0, cpw(cuni(c0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(hs0)), cnrm)))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wral(hs0, cpw(cuni(c0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(hs0)), cnrm)), wcel(c0, ctop))
  iscnrm(hs0, c0, cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  adantl(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cin(c1, cuni(c0)), cpw(cuni(c0))))
  mpbiri(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cin(c1, cuni(c0)), cpw(cuni(c0))), wss(cin(c1, cuni(c0)), cuni(c0)))
  inss2(c1, cuni(c0))
  syl(wcel(c1, c2), wb(wcel(cin(c1, cuni(c0)), cpw(cuni(c0))), wss(cin(c1, cuni(c0)), cuni(c0))), wcel(cin(c1, cuni(c0)), universe))
  inex1g(c1, c2, cuni(c0))
  elpwg(cin(c1, cuni(c0)), universe, cuni(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c1, cuni(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cuni(c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c0, crest, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), cnrm))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cnrmi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CNrm ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c0[|`t]c1)∈ Nrm)
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0[|`t]c1), cnrm, (c0[|`t](c1 ⋂ ⋃ c0)), (c0 ∈ CNrm ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  restin(c0, ccnrm, c1, c2, ⋃ c0)
  rspcdva(hs0, (c1 ⋂ ⋃ c0), P(⋃ c0), (c0 ∈ CNrm ∧ c1 ∈ c2), (c0[|`t](c1 ⋂ ⋃ c0))∈ Nrm, (c0[|`t]hs0)∈ Nrm)
  eleq1d((c0[|`t]hs0), cnrm, (c0[|`t](c1 ⋂ ⋃ c0)), hs0 =(c1 ⋂ ⋃ c0))
  oveq2(hs0, (c1 ⋂ ⋃ c0), c0, crest)
  adantr(c0 ∈ CNrm, c1 ∈ c2, ∀(hs0 ∈ P(⋃ c0),(c0[|`t]hs0)∈ Nrm))
  simprbi(c0 ∈ CNrm, ∀(hs0 ∈ P(⋃ c0),(c0[|`t]hs0)∈ Nrm), c0 ∈ Top)
  iscnrm(hs0, c0, ⋃ c0)
  eqid(⋃ c0)
  adantl(c0 ∈ CNrm, c1 ∈ c2, (c1 ⋂ ⋃ c0)∈ P(⋃ c0))
  mpbiri(c1 ∈ c2, (c1 ⋂ ⋃ c0)∈ P(⋃ c0), (c1 ⋂ ⋃ c0)⊆ ⋃ c0)
  inss2(c1, ⋃ c0)
  syl(c1 ∈ c2, ((c1 ⋂ ⋃ c0)∈ P(⋃ c0)↔(c1 ⋂ ⋃ c0)⊆ ⋃ c0), (c1 ⋂ ⋃ c0)∈ 𝕌)
  inex1g(c1, c2, ⋃ c0)
  elpwg((c1 ⋂ ⋃ c0), universe, ⋃ c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 ⋂ ⋃ c0))
  diff.hs0.c(P(⋃ c0))
  diff.hs0.w((c0[|`t](c1 ⋂ ⋃ c0))∈ Nrm)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(⋃ c0)
}

  ralrimiva(hs0, cpw(cin(c1, cuni(c0))), wa(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(co(c0, crest, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), crest, cv(hs0)), cnrm))

  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cin(c1, cuni(c0))))), wceq(co(co(c0, crest, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), crest, cv(hs0)), co(c0, crest, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, ccnrm), wss(cv(hs0), cin(c1, cuni(c0))), wcel(cin(c1, cuni(c0)), universe))
  simpll(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cin(c1, cuni(c0)))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cin(c1, cuni(c0)))), wss(cv(hs0), cin(c1, cuni(c0))))
  elpwi(cv(hs0), cin(c1, cuni(c0)))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cin(c1, cuni(c0)))), wcel(cin(c1, cuni(c0)), universe))
  inex1g(c1, c2, cuni(c0))
  restabs(c0, ccnrm, cv(hs0), cin(c1, cuni(c0)), universe)
  adantlr(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cin(c1, cuni(c0)))), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(hs0)), cnrm))
  cnrmi(c0, cv(hs0), cpw(cin(c1, cuni(c0))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wcel(co(c0, crest, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), ccnrm), wral(hs0, cpw(cin(c1, cuni(c0))), wcel(co(co(c0, crest, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), crest, cv(hs0)), cnrm))), wcel(co(c0, crest, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), cfv(ctopon, cin(c1, cuni(c0)))))
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), cfv(ctopon, cin(c1, cuni(c0)))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wss(cin(c1, cuni(c0)), cuni(c0)))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  adantr(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, ctop))
  cnrmtop(c0)
  toptopon2(c0)
  inss2(c1, cuni(c0))
  resttopon(c0, cuni(c0), cin(c1, cuni(c0)))
  iscnrm2(hs0, co(c0, crest, cin(c1, cuni(c0))), cin(c1, cuni(c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c1, c2)))

  clsss3(c0, c1, c2)

blocks.name: perfcls
blocks.content: A subset of a perfect space is perfect iff its closure is perfect (and the closure is an actual perfect set, since it is both closed and perfect in the subspace topology). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:

  lpcls(c0, c1, c2)
  syl6bbr(wa(wcel(c0, ct1), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), wss(cun(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)))
  sseq1d(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), cun(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, ct1), wss(c1, c2)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, ct1), wss(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1), cun(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  clslp(c0, c1, c2)
  bitri(wss(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), wss(cun(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), wceq(cun(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)))
  ssequn1(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1))
  mpbiran2(wceq(cun(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), wss(cun(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), wss(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), cun(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1))))
  ssun2(cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1), c1)
  eqss(cun(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1)), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1))
  sylan(wcel(c0, ct1), wss(c1, c2), wb(wcel(co(c0, crest, c1), cperf), wss(c1, cfv(cfv(clp, c0), c1))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  restperf(c0, c1, c2, co(c0, crest, c1))
  eqid(co(c0, crest, c1))
  sylan(wcel(c0, ct1), wss(c1, c2), wb(wcel(co(c0, crest, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)), cperf), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  t1top(c0)
  syldan(wcel(c0, ctop), wss(c1, c2), wb(wcel(co(c0, crest, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)), cperf), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1), cfv(cfv(clp, c0), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1)))), wss(cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c1), c2))
  clsss3(c0, c1, c2)

blocks.name: restt0
blocks.content: A subspace of a T_0 topology is T_0. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: restt1
blocks.content: A subspace of a T_1 topology is T_1. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: resthaus
blocks.content: A subspace of a Hausdorff topology is Hausdorff. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Mar-2015.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: t1sep2
blocks.content: Any two points in a T_1 space which have no separation are equal. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Feb-2010.)
blocks.origin:

} = {
  3impb(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, c3)))

  syl(wcel(c0, ct1), wb(wcel(c0, ct1), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
  sylib(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wcel(c0, ctop))

  ralbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0))), wi(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0))))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wcel(c1, cv(s0)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0))

  ralbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wi(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0))), wi(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0)))

thm t1sep2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Fre ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2)→(∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 → c3 ∈ s0))→ c1 = c3))

  ibi(c0 ∈ Fre, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs1 ∈ c2,(∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 → hs1 ∈ s0))→ hs0 = hs1))))

  sylib(c0 ∈ Fre, c0 ∈(TopOn ` c2), c0 ∈ Top)
  t1top(c0)
  toptopon(c0, c2)
  ist1-2(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c2)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3, c2, (∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 → hs1 ∈ s0))→ hs0 = hs1), (∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 → c3 ∈ s0))→ c1 = c3), (∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 → hs1 ∈ s0))→ c1 = hs1))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 → hs1 ∈ s0)), hs0 = hs1, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 → hs1 ∈ s0)), c1 = hs1)
  ralbidv(s0, c0, hs0 = c1, (hs0 ∈ s0 → hs1 ∈ s0), (c1 ∈ s0 → hs1 ∈ s0))
  imbi1d(hs0 = c1, hs0 ∈ s0, hs1 ∈ s0, c1 ∈ s0)
  eleq1(hs0, c1, s0)
  eqeq1(hs0, c1, hs1)
  imbi12d(hs1 = c3, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 → hs1 ∈ s0)), c1 = hs1, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 → c3 ∈ s0)), c1 = c3)
  ralbidv(s0, c0, hs1 = c3, (c1 ∈ s0 → hs1 ∈ s0), (c1 ∈ s0 → c3 ∈ s0))
  imbi2d(hs1 = c3, c1 ∈ s0, hs1 ∈ s0, c3 ∈ s0)
  eleq1(hs1, c3, s0)

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w((∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 → hs1 ∈ s0))→ c1 = hs1))
  diff.hs1.w((∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ s0 → c3 ∈ s0))→ c1 = c3))

blocks.name: t1sep
blocks.content: Any two distinct points in a T_1 space are separated by an open set. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Feb-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm t1sep(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

  necon3ad(c1, c3, wa(wcel(c0, ct1), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c1, c3))), wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0)))))
  3adant3r3(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c1, c3), wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(c1, cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, c3)))

blocks.name: sncld

blocks.name: sshauslem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ sshaus and similar theorems. If the topological property ` A ` is preserved under injective preimages, then a topology finer than one with property ` A ` also has property ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm sshauslem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wss(c0, c2)), wcel(c2, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
  -| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, ctop))
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf1(cres(cid, c3), c3, c3), wcel(cres(cid, c3), co(c2, ccn, c0))), wcel(c2, c1))
} = {
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wss(c0, c2)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c0, c1), wf1(cres(cid, c3), c3, c3), wcel(cres(cid, c3), co(c2, ccn, c0)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wss(c0, c2))
  mp1i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c3)), wss(c0, c2)), wf1(cres(cid, c3), c3, c3), wf1o(cres(cid, c3), c3, c3))

thm sshauslem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)∧ c0 ⊆ c2)→ c2 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ c3 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈ Top)
  ⊣ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧((= |` c3): c3 ↣ c3)∧(= |` c3)∈(c2[Cn]c0))→ c2 ∈ c1)
} = {
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)∧ c0 ⊆ c2), c2 ∈ c1, c0 ∈ c1, ((= |` c3): c3 ↣ c3), (= |` c3)∈(c2[Cn]c0))
  simp1(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3), c0 ⊆ c2)
  mp1i((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)∧ c0 ⊆ c2), ((= |` c3): c3 ↣ c3), ((= |` c3): c3 ↔ c3))
  f1oi(c3)
  f1of1((= |` c3), c3, c3)
  mpbird((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)∧ c0 ⊆ c2), (= |` c3)∈(c2[Cn]c0), c0 ⊆ c2)
  simp3(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3), c0 ⊆ c2)
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)∧ c0 ⊆ c2), ((= |` c3)∈(c2[Cn]c0)↔ c0 ⊆ c2), c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3), c0 ∈(TopOn ` c3))
  simp2(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3), c0 ⊆ c2)
  sylib((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3)∧ c0 ⊆ c2), c0 ∈(TopOn ` c3), c0 ∈ Top)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈(TopOn ` c3), c0 ⊆ c2, c0 ∈ Top)
  toptopon(c0, c3)
  ssidcn(c2, c3, c0)
}

blocks.name: sst0
blocks.content: A topology finer than a T_0 topology is T_0. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: sst1

blocks.name: sshaus
blocks.content: A topology finer than a Hausdorff topology is Hausdorff. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: regsep2
blocks.content: In a regular space, a closed set is separated by open sets from a point not in it. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Feb-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: isreg2
blocks.content: A topological space is regular if any closed set is separated from any point not in it by neighborhoods. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Feb-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)

thm isreg2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→(c0 ∈ Reg ↔ ∀(s0 ∈(Clsd ` c0), ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(¬ s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ c0,(s0 ⊆ s2 ∧ s1 ∈ s3 ∧(s2 ⋂ s3)= ∅))))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
} = {
  impbida(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c0 ∈ Reg, ∀(s0 ∈(Clsd ` c0), ∀(s1 ∈ c1,(¬ s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ c0,(s0 ⊆ s2 ∧ s1 ∈ s3 ∧(s2 ⋂ s3)= ∅)))))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, (Clsd ` c0), c1, (c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0 ∈ Reg), (¬ s1 ∈ s0 → ∃(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ c0,(s0 ⊆ s2 ∧ s1 ∈ s3 ∧(s2 ⋂ s3)= ∅)))))
  3expia((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0 ∈ Reg), (s0 ∈(Clsd ` c0)∧ s1 ∈ c1), ¬ s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ c0,(s0 ⊆ s2 ∧ s1 ∈ s3 ∧(s2 ⋂ s3)= ∅))))
  syl13anc(((c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1)∧ c0 ∈ Reg)∧(s0 ∈(Clsd ` c0)∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ ¬ s1 ∈ s0), ∃(s2 ∈ c0, ∃(s3 ∈ c0,(s0 ⊆ s2 ∧ s1 ∈ s3 ∧(s2 ⋂ s3)= ∅))), c0 ∈ Reg, s0 ∈(Clsd ` c0), s1 ∈ ⋃ c0, ¬ s1 ∈ s0)
  simp1r(c0 ∈(TopOn ` c1), c0 ∈ Reg, (s0 ∈(Clsd ` c0)∧ s1 ∈ c1), ¬ s1 ∈ s0)

blocks.name: dnsconst
blocks.content: If a continuous mapping to a T_1 space is constant on a dense subset, it is constant on the entire space. Note that ` ( ( cls `` J ) `` A ) = X ` means " ` A ` is dense in ` X ` " and ` A C_ ( ``' F " { P } ) ` means " ` F ` is constant on ` A ` " (see ~ funconstss ). (Contributed by NM, 15-Mar-2007.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm dnsconst(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ct1), wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c0))), w3a(wcel(c3, c4), wss(c5, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(c3))), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c2), c5), c6))), wf(c1, c6, csn(c3)))
  -| wceq(c6, cuni(c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cuni(c0))
} = {

thm ordtt1(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ PosetRel →(ordTop ` c0)∈ Fre)
} = {
  sylanbrc(c0 ∈ PosetRel, (ordTop ` c0)∈ Fre, (ordTop ` c0)∈ Top, ∀(hs0 ∈ ⋃(ordTop ` c0), { hs0 } ∈(Clsd `(ordTop ` c0))))
  ordttop(c0, cps)
  mpbid(c0 ∈ PosetRel, ∀(hs0 ∈ ⋃(ordTop ` c0), { hs0 } ∈(Clsd `(ordTop ` c0))), ∀(hs0 ∈ dom(c0), { hs0 } ∈(Clsd `(ordTop ` c0))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, dom(c0), c0 ∈ PosetRel, { hs0 } ∈(Clsd `(ordTop ` c0)))
  eqeltrd({ hs0 }, (Clsd `(ordTop ` c0)), { hs1 ∈ dom(c0)|(hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs0)}, (c0 ∈ PosetRel ∧ hs0 ∈ dom(c0)))
  eqtr3d({ hs0 }, { hs1 ∈ dom(c0)|(hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs0)}, (dom(c0)⋂ { hs0 }), (c0 ∈ PosetRel ∧ hs0 ∈ dom(c0)))
  sylib((c0 ∈ PosetRel ∧ hs0 ∈ dom(c0)), (dom(c0)⋂ { hs0 })= { hs0 }, { hs0 } ⊆ dom(c0))
  adantl(c0 ∈ PosetRel, hs0 ∈ dom(c0), { hs0 } ⊆ dom(c0))
  snssi(hs0, dom(c0))
  sseqin2({ hs0 }, dom(c0))
  rabbi2dva(hs1, dom(c0), { hs0 }, (c0 ∈ PosetRel ∧ hs0 ∈ dom(c0)), (hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs0))
  syl5bb(((c0 ∈ PosetRel ∧ hs0 ∈ dom(c0))∧ hs1 ∈ dom(c0)), hs1 ∈ { hs0 }, (hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs0), hs1 = hs0)
  velsn(hs1, hs0)
  impbid(((c0 ∈ PosetRel ∧ hs0 ∈ dom(c0))∧ hs1 ∈ dom(c0)), hs1 = hs0, (hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs0))
  syl5ibrcom(((c0 ∈ PosetRel ∧ hs0 ∈ dom(c0))∧ hs1 ∈ dom(c0)), hs1 = hs0, (hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs0), (hs0[c0]hs0 ∧ hs0[c0]hs0))
  jca(((c0 ∈ PosetRel ∧ hs0 ∈ dom(c0))∧ hs1 ∈ dom(c0)), hs0[c0]hs0, hs0[c0]hs0)
  adantr((c0 ∈ PosetRel ∧ hs0 ∈ dom(c0)), hs1 ∈ dom(c0), hs0[c0]hs0)
  psref(c0, hs0, dom(c0))
  anbi12d(hs1 = hs0, hs0[c0]hs1, hs1[c0]hs0, hs0[c0]hs0, hs0[c0]hs0)
  breq2(hs1, hs0, hs0, c0)
  breq1(hs1, hs0, c0, hs0)
  ad2antrr(c0 ∈ PosetRel, hs0 ∈ dom(c0), hs1 ∈ dom(c0), ((hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs0)→ hs1 = hs0))
  3expib(c0 ∈ PosetRel, hs0[c0]hs1, hs1[c0]hs0, hs1 = hs0)
  equcomd(hs1, hs0, (c0 ∈ PosetRel ∧ hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs0))
  psasym(c0, hs0, hs1)
  3anidm23(c0 ∈ PosetRel, hs0 ∈ dom(c0), { hs1 ∈ dom(c0)|(hs0[c0]hs1 ∧ hs1[c0]hs0)} ∈(Clsd `(ordTop ` c0)))
  ordtcld3(hs1, c0, cps, hs0, dom(c0), hs0)
  raleqdv(hs0, dom(c0), ⋃(ordTop ` c0), c0 ∈ PosetRel, { hs0 } ∈(Clsd `(ordTop ` c0)))
  syl(c0 ∈ PosetRel, dom(c0)= ⋃(ordTop ` c0), (ordTop ` c0)∈(TopOn ` dom(c0)))
  ordttopon(c0, cps, dom(c0))
  eqid(dom(c0))
  toponuni((ordTop ` c0), dom(c0))
  ist1(hs0, (ordTop ` c0), ⋃(ordTop ` c0))
  eqid(⋃(ordTop ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ PosetRel)

  sylibr(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))∧ hs0 ≠ hs1), { hs0 } ∈ P(c0), { hs0 } ⊆ c0)
  snssd(hs0, c0, ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))∧ hs0 ≠ hs1))

  sylibr(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))∧ hs0 ≠ hs1), { hs1 } ∈ P(c0), { hs1 } ⊆ c0)
  snssd(hs1, c0, ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))∧ hs0 ≠ hs1))

  disjsn2(hs0, hs1)
  rspc2ev(hs2, hs3, { hs0 }, P(c0), { hs1 }, P(c0), (hs0 ∈ { hs0 } ∧ hs1 ∈ { hs1 } ∧({ hs0 } ⋂ { hs1 })= ∅), (hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧ hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧(hs2 ⋂ hs3)= ∅), (hs0 ∈ { hs0 } ∧ hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧({ hs0 } ⋂ hs3)= ∅))
  3anbi13d(hs2 = { hs0 }, hs0 ∈ hs2, hs1 ∈ hs3, (hs2 ⋂ hs3)= ∅, hs0 ∈ { hs0 }, ({ hs0 } ⋂ hs3)= ∅)

thm ordthaus(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ TosetRel →(ordTop ` c0)∈ Haus)
} = {
  mpbird(c0 ∈ TosetRel, (ordTop ` c0)∈ Haus, ∀(hs0 ∈ dom(c0), ∀(hs1 ∈ dom(c0),(hs0 ≠ hs1 → ∃(hs2 ∈(ordTop ` c0), ∃(hs3 ∈(ordTop ` c0),(hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧ hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧(hs2 ⋂ hs3)= ∅)))))))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, dom(c0), dom(c0), c0 ∈ TosetRel, (hs0 ≠ hs1 → ∃(hs2 ∈(ordTop ` c0), ∃(hs3 ∈(ordTop ` c0),(hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧ hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧(hs2 ⋂ hs3)= ∅)))))
  3expb(c0 ∈ TosetRel, hs0 ∈ dom(c0), hs1 ∈ dom(c0), (hs0 ≠ hs1 → ∃(hs2 ∈(ordTop ` c0), ∃(hs3 ∈(ordTop ` c0),(hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧ hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧(hs2 ⋂ hs3)= ∅)))))
  mpjaod((c0 ∈ TosetRel ∧ hs0 ∈ dom(c0)∧ hs1 ∈ dom(c0)), (hs0 ≠ hs1 → ∃(hs2 ∈(ordTop ` c0), ∃(hs3 ∈(ordTop ` c0),(hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧ hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧(hs2 ⋂ hs3)= ∅)))), hs0[c0]hs1, hs1[c0]hs0)
  ordthauslem(hs2, hs3, c0, hs0, dom(c0), hs1)
  3com23(c0 ∈ TosetRel, hs0 ∈ dom(c0), hs1 ∈ dom(c0), (hs1[c0]hs0 →(hs0 ≠ hs1 → ∃(hs2 ∈(ordTop ` c0), ∃(hs3 ∈(ordTop ` c0),(hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧ hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧(hs2 ⋂ hs3)= ∅))))))
  syl6ib((c0 ∈ TosetRel ∧ hs1 ∈ dom(c0)∧ hs0 ∈ dom(c0)), hs1[c0]hs0, (hs0 ≠ hs1 → ∃(hs2 ∈(ordTop ` c0), ∃(hs3 ∈(ordTop ` c0),(hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧ hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧(hs2 ⋂ hs3)= ∅)))), (hs1 ≠ hs0 → ∃(hs3 ∈(ordTop ` c0), ∃(hs2 ∈(ordTop ` c0),(hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧ hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧(hs3 ⋂ hs2)= ∅)))))
  ordthauslem(hs3, hs2, c0, hs1, dom(c0), hs0)
  imbi12i(hs1 ≠ hs0, ∃(hs3 ∈(ordTop ` c0), ∃(hs2 ∈(ordTop ` c0),(hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧ hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧(hs3 ⋂ hs2)= ∅))), hs0 ≠ hs1, ∃(hs2 ∈(ordTop ` c0), ∃(hs3 ∈(ordTop ` c0),(hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧ hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧(hs2 ⋂ hs3)= ∅))))
  necom(hs1, hs0)
  bitri(∃(hs3 ∈(ordTop ` c0), ∃(hs2 ∈(ordTop ` c0),(hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧ hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧(hs3 ⋂ hs2)= ∅))), ∃(hs2 ∈(ordTop ` c0), ∃(hs3 ∈(ordTop ` c0),(hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧ hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧(hs2 ⋂ hs3)= ∅))), ∃(hs3 ∈(ordTop ` c0), ∃(hs2 ∈(ordTop ` c0),(hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧ hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧(hs2 ⋂ hs3)= ∅))))
  2rexbii(hs3, hs2, (ordTop ` c0), (ordTop ` c0), (hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧ hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧(hs3 ⋂ hs2)= ∅), (hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧ hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧(hs2 ⋂ hs3)= ∅))
  bitri((hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧ hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧(hs3 ⋂ hs2)= ∅), (hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧ hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧(hs2 ⋂ hs3)= ∅), (hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧ hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧(hs3 ⋂ hs2)= ∅))
  3ancoma(hs1 ∈ hs3, hs0 ∈ hs2, (hs3 ⋂ hs2)= ∅)
  3anbi3i(hs0 ∈ hs2, hs1 ∈ hs3, (hs3 ⋂ hs2)= ∅, (hs2 ⋂ hs3)= ∅)
  eqeq1i((hs3 ⋂ hs2), emptycls, (hs2 ⋂ hs3))
  incom(hs3, hs2)
  rexcom(hs3, hs2, (ordTop ` c0), (ordTop ` c0), (hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧ hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧(hs2 ⋂ hs3)= ∅))
  tsrlin(c0, hs0, dom(c0), hs1)
  syl(c0 ∈ TosetRel, ((ordTop ` c0)∈ Haus ↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ dom(c0), ∀(hs1 ∈ dom(c0),(hs0 ≠ hs1 → ∃(hs2 ∈(ordTop ` c0), ∃(hs3 ∈(ordTop ` c0),(hs0 ∈ hs2 ∧ hs1 ∈ hs3 ∧(hs2 ⋂ hs3)= ∅))))))), (ordTop ` c0)∈(TopOn ` dom(c0)))
  ordttopon(c0, ctsr, dom(c0))
  eqid(dom(c0))
  ishaus2(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, (ordTop ` c0), dom(c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(dom(c0))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ TosetRel)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ∈ TosetRel)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(dom(c0))
  diff.hs2.c(hs1)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(hs0)
  diff.hs3.c(dom(c0))
  diff.hs3.c(hs1)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.c((ordTop ` c0))
  diff.hs2.c((ordTop ` c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.c((ordTop ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(dom(c0))
  diff.hs1.c((ordTop ` c0))
}
